title: Practice Ignition: What to do when Xero & Quickbooks increase their prices
description: A simple process for updating vendor software prices
body:
With recent price increases from both Xero and Quickbooks, let us show you how easy it can be to change service prices in bulk for all your client agreements.

Join our webinar to future proof your firm.

<https://landing.practiceignition.com/vendor-price-increase-emea>
